posts.post_content:
Much of the time I'd just as soon play this as any of the myriad flying-granting blue spells and effects out there.  
  
@Gatsumon: It's more like this.  
Player 1: "I play Levitation."  
Player 2: "I play [Silklash Spider](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Silklash Spider)"  
Player 1: "[Unsummon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Unsummon) Silklash Spider."  
(Player 1 then counters the Spider when Player 2 attempts to re-cast)  
Player 2: "FFFFFFFFFFUUUUUUUUUUUUU!"
